casebody.data:
THE FIDELITY BANK
v.
N.C. DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE 392A16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 28, 2016 Donalt J. Eglinton, Attorney at Law, New Bern, Alexander C. Dale, Attorney at Law, Wilmington, Amy P. Wang, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for The Fidelity Bank. Perry J. Pelaez, Assistant Attorney General, for N.C. Department of Revenue.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 27th of October 2016 by Petitioner to Hold Appeal in Abeyance Pending Determination of Petition for Discretionary Review in Companion Case:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 28th of October 2016."
